      <title>Drop It &amp; Let It Go</title>

      <title>Stepdad: Lead Through Your Wife</title>
      <itunes:title>Stepdad: Lead Through Your Wife</itunes:title>
      <description><![CDATA[<p>A good father serves and leads his family, and executes authority in the home. Stepdads can do this, too, but in the beginning it may look a little different.</p> <p><strong>Show Notes and Resources</strong></p> <ul> <li>Find out more at&nbsp;<a href="https://www.familylife.com/familylifeblended/blended-families/">familylife.com/blended</a></li> <li>Check out our&nbsp;<a href="https://shop.familylife.com/product-category/marriage/blended-family/">blended family resources.</a>&nbsp;</li> <li>Listen to the full-length&nbsp;<a href="https://www.familylife.com/podcast/familylife-blended-podcast/">FamilyLife Blended podcast</a>.&nbsp;</li> <li>Contact us, email&nbsp;<a href="mailto:blended@familylife.com">blended@familylife.com</a></li> </ul><p> See <a href=“https://www.cru.org/us/en/about/privacy.html”>cru.org/us/en/about/privacy</a> FamilyLife’s Privacy Policy</p>]]></description>
      <content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>A good father serves and leads his family, and executes authority in the home. Stepdads can do this, too, but in the beginning it may look a little different.</p> <p><strong>Show Notes and Resources</strong></p> <ul> <li>Find out more at&nbsp;<a href="https://www.familylife.com/familylifeblended/blended-families/">familylife.com/blended</a></li> <li>Check out our&nbsp;<a href="https://shop.familylife.com/product-category/marriage/blended-family/">blended family resources.</a>&nbsp;</li> <li>Listen to the full-length&nbsp;<a href="https://www.familylife.com/podcast/familylife-blended-podcast/">FamilyLife Blended podcast</a>.&nbsp;</li> <li>Contact us, email&nbsp;<a href="mailto:blended@familylife.com">blended@familylife.com</a></li> </ul><p> See <a href=“https://www.cru.org/us/en/about/privacy.html”>cru.org/us/en/about/privacy</a> FamilyLife’s Privacy Policy</p>]]></content:encoded>

      <itunes:summary>Did you know that when it comes to your neighbor, the Bible says that if you can’t say anything nice, don’t say anything at all?</itunes:summary>

      <title>Different Love, Still Family</title>
      <itunes:title>Different Love, Still Family</itunes:title>
      <description><![CDATA[<p>Friends. Some of us have a lot of them and some of us have only a few. But do you love them all the same?</p> <p><strong>Show Notes and Resources</strong></p> <ul> <li>Find out more at&nbsp;<a href="https://www.familylife.com/familylifeblended/blended-families/">familylife.com/blended</a></li> <li>Check out our&nbsp;<a href="https://shop.familylife.com/product-category/marriage/blended-family/">blended family resources.</a>&nbsp;</li> <li>Listen to the full-length&nbsp;<a href="https://www.familylife.com/podcast/familylife-blended-podcast/">FamilyLife Blended podcast</a>.&nbsp;</li> <li>Contact us, email&nbsp;<a href="mailto:blended@familylife.com">blended@familylife.com</a></li> </ul><p> See <a href=“https://www.cru.org/us/en/about/privacy.html”>cru.org/us/en/about/privacy</a> FamilyLife’s Privacy Policy</p>]]></description>

      <itunes:summary>When it comes to social justice, facing adversity with self-control has the biggest impact.</itunes:summary>
      <itunes:episodeType>full</itunes:episodeType>

      <description><![CDATA[<p>What happens when a dad and stepdad team up?       <title>Stepdad: Move in With Tact</title>
      <itunes:title>Stepdad: Move in With Tact</itunes:title>
      <description><![CDATA[<p>Yo, Dude. Hey, slow down.       <content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Yo, Dude. Hey, slow down.       <title>Part-Time Biological Parenting: Expectation Double Standard</title>
      <itunes:title>Part-Time Biological Parenting: Expectation Double Standard</itunes:title>
      <description><![CDATA[<p>Part-time biological parents are sometimes tempted to have an expectation double standard for their kids. But why?</p> <p>Show Notes and Resources</p> <p> Find out more at <a href="https://www.familylife.com/familylifeblended/blended-families/">familylife.com/blended</a><br> Check out our <a href="https://shop.familylife.com/product-category/marriage/blended-family/">blended family resources.</a><br> Listen to the full-length <a href="https://www.familylife.com/podcast/familylife-blended-podcast/">FamilyLife Blended podcast</a>.<br> Contact us, email <a href="mailto:blended@familylife.com">blended@familylife.com</a></p><p> See <a href=“https://www.cru.org/us/en/about/privacy.html”>cru.org/us/en/about/privacy</a> FamilyLife’s Privacy Policy</p>]]></description>

      <title>Seeking Reconciliation (Romans 12)</title>

      <title>Business Meeting</title>

      <description><![CDATA[<p>Parents it may be time for a business meeting. No doubt lots of parenting takes place on the fly. I'll be honest. We're pretty much making it up as we go, right?       <title>Long-Term Marital Happiness</title>
